data.title: Friendly staff - nice place to hang
data.text: Located in the lobby of the San Marcos Crowne Plaza, this is a nice little place with a friendly staff and good food.  I had a cheese platter and a couple of margaritas one afternoon - drinks were well made, cheese and crackers were served in a generous, attractive portion, and I enjoyed talking with the staff.

data.title: Very good small town steak house atmosphere on the main drag in Chandler
data.text: Good place in the Chandler downtown to drop in for an intimate meal. Great selection, quick service and fair priced for the offerings

data.title: Questionable Value
data.text: The breakfast buffet has all I need for breakfast, but has risen in price from $8.95 to $14.95 with the new ownership. For Dinner I had a smothered steak. I like the sauce, but even cooked medium it was tough and again prices have gone up on dinner as well. I don't think I will be eating dinner there again, but will walk to one of the restaurants across the street.

data.title: Great!
data.text: The lounge is a great place to relax!  Staff are excellent and friendly!  They are currently remodeling this area but continue to serve and accommodate everyone. You won't be disappointed!

data.title: Good food - happy hour
data.text: Small selection/menu for the happy hour but should be something there to please everyone.  Large portions! - and very good.

data.title: A friendly, intimate place for drinks
data.text: Our group showed up very late on a Friday night and unfortunately the kitchen was closed. Nevertheless, we found the 1912 Lounge to be warm and friendly with an extensive wine and cocktail list. It's a very nice environment, romantic and boisterous at the same time and has a fire pit outside in the back for those crisp winter evenings. Nice live music on the weekends. We will definitely go back when the kitchen is open next time.

data.title: Happy Hour Heaven!
data.text: We enjoyed the GREAT Happy Hour specials while we were staying at the San Marco. 1/2 price Bar Menu items and discounted drinks!  In addition, we ordered room service a few times and NEVER got a bad meal.  The food was great, the service was great -- and the prices were really good! (especially for room service!)  Justin, our room service attendant, was FANTASTIC!!  He went above and beyond!!

data.title: good food, decent prices, great staff
data.text: Do not miss the specials....Friday Fish Fry, Saturday Prime Rib Buffet....Sunday Brunch...RESERVE, they are popular.

data.title: Good Place to Relax and Enjoy Music and Talk
data.text: Good Lounge area and Restaurant area.Very GOOD FOOD for the Money
